translations: n．粉饰，掩饰：对错误、罪行等进行掩盖或美化的行为。
v．粉饰，掩饰：对错误、罪行等进行掩盖或美化。

sentences.sentence: The service items mainly include: Maintains cleanliness, the clean, waxes, whitewashes, renovates, trash cleans up and takes away and so on comprehension service.
sentences.translation: 服务项目主要包括：保洁，清洗，打蜡，粉刷，翻新，垃圾清运等综合服务。
